title: Fall On Your Knees
description: "This big, bold, epic shocker of a novel reads as if John Irving meet Joyce Carol Oates in her Gothic period....It's a wild ride". -- Sandra Scofield, Chicago TribuneA runaway #1 bestseller in Canada, this riveting family saga takes readers from Cape Breton Island to the battlefields of World War I to New York City's jazz scene -- and into the lives, and guilty secrets, of four remarkable sisters."Fall on Your Knees proves that sisterhood is powerful -- but not exactly as we thought it would be". -- Rita Mae Brown
author: Ann-Marie MacDonald
